name: NEW PCO II INVESTMENTS LTD.
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to the passage of the Canadian Snowbird Act
Issues related to providing Canadians who own property in the United States with extra time to visit through the passage of H.R.3070, the Canadian Snowbird Act.
